definition: Feeling or showing pleasure or contentment.
Feeling sorrow or unhappiness.
Moving or capable of moving at high speed.
Moving or operating at a low speed.
Of considerable size, extent, or intensity.
Of a size that is less than normal or usual.
To be desired or approved of; having the required qualities.
Not such as to be hoped for or desired; unpleasant or unwelcome.
Having a high degree of heat or a high temperature.
Of or at a low or relatively low temperature.
Of little weight; easy to lift.
With little or no light.
Having the power to move heavy weights or perform other physically demanding tasks.
Lacking the power to perform physically demanding tasks; lacking physical strength.
Happening or done before the usual or expected time.
Doing something or taking place after the expected, proper, or usual time.
Having lived or existed for only a short time; not old.
Having lived for a long time; no longer young.
Achieved without great effort; presenting few difficulties.
Requiring a great deal of endurance or effort.
